text:
Viktor Mikhaylovich Zimin (: August 23, 1962 – November 23, 2020) was a Russian politician. He was Chairman of the Government of the Republic of Khakassia from 2009 until 2018.
In 2018, he lost his bid for re-election to a third term in the first round of voting.
Zimin died in Moscow on November 23, 2020 from COVID-19 at the age of 58.
